description: Social-zombie is a system to share resources between non-infected humans via API.
title: Social-Zombie

_88infection.description: Infection reports of survivors, when a survivor is reported as infected 3 times, he/she is considered a zombie and therefore cannot trade or interact anymore.

links.description: Report another survivor as infected, only works when logged.
links.title: Create

_88infection.title: Infection

_88survivor.description: User of the system, surviving on the zombie-crawled wasteland. When with pending trades to accept or review a pending_trade HTTP header will be attached to all requests

links.description: Receives reports of population status, including - healthy percentage, infected percentage, and totals
links.title: Survivors status

links.description: Receives reports of items status, including - Average amount of each kind of resource by survivor (e.g. 5 waters per user) and Points lost because of infected survivor. et. al.",
links.title: Items status

_88survivor.title: Survivor

_88trade.description: Represents the transaction of items between survivors, while a survivor has a trade that hasn't been marked as :accepted and :reviewed it will receive all logged on requests marked with a 'pending_trade' HTTP header, which contains the trade's information as JSON

$eref.description: items from the origin of transaction, represented by 'items' array of JSON Item objects
survivor recipient of the trade, will be warned of pending trade through pending_trade HTTP header on every logged request, until it is marked as :accepted and :reviewed

links.description: Create a new trade, at this point, only the attributes :to and :from_items must to be passed. After it's creation both users will receive all responses marked with pending_trade HHTP header, containing the data for this trade, until marked as :accepted and :reviewed.
links.title: Create

links.description: Delete an existing trade, only possible if logged survivor is one the :to or :from_items survivors and if trade isn't accepted and reviewed.
links.title: Delete

$eref.description: items from the origin of transaction, represented by 'items' array of JSON Item objects

items added to trade with :from_items :owner, represented by 'items' array of JSON Item objects. It's owner will be warned of pending trade through pending_trade HTTP header on every logged request, until it is marked as :accepted and :reviewed
boolean to indicate acceptance of trade by :to recipient
boolean to indicate review of trade by 'from' recipient and, after value is set to true it's items are exchanged
survivor recipient of the trade, will be warned of pending trade through pending_trade HTTP header on every logged request, until it is marked as :accepted and :reviewed

links.description: Update an existing trade, at this point there are 2 options for trade update 1 - The :to survivor is replying with :accepted and :to_items 2 - The survivor that owns :from_survivor is replying with :reviewed, so that the trade can be completed
links.title: Update

_88trade.title: Trade

_88reviewed.description: boolean to indicate review of trade by 'from' recipient and, after value is set to true it's items are exchanged

_88accepted.description: boolean to indicate acceptance of trade by :to recipient

_88to_items.description: items added to trade with :from_items :owner, represented by 'items' array of JSON Item objects. It's owner will be warned of pending trade through pending_trade HTTP header on every logged request, until it is marked as :accepted and :reviewed

_88from_items.description: items from the origin of transaction, represented by 'items' array of JSON Item objects

_88to.description: survivor recipient of the trade, will be warned of pending trade through pending_trade HTTP header on every logged request, until it is marked as :accepted and :reviewed

$eref.description: items from the origin of transaction, represented by 'items' array of JSON Item objects

items added to trade with :from_items :owner, represented by 'items' array of JSON Item objects. It's owner will be warned of pending trade through pending_trade HTTP header on every logged request, until it is marked as :accepted and :reviewed
boolean to indicate acceptance of trade by :to recipient
boolean to indicate review of trade by 'from' recipient and, after value is set to true it's items are exchanged
survivor recipient of the trade, will be warned of pending trade through pending_trade HTTP header on every logged request, until it is marked as :accepted and :reviewed

_88item.description: Items - Water, food, medicataion or ammunition of a survivor
_88item.title: Item

links.title: Create

links.title: Delete

links.title: Update
